headline.main: Ex-Flint Manager Says He Relied on Experts in Water Crisis
headline.print_headline: Ex-Flint Manager Says He Relied on Experts in Water Crisis

docs.snippet: The state-appointed emergency manager who oversaw Flint, Michigan when its water source was switched to the Flint River says he relied on state and federal experts, but the experts failed him and the city of some 100,000 people....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state-appointed emergency manager who oversaw Flint, Michigan when its water source was switched to the Flint River says he relied on state and federal experts, but the experts failed him and the city of some 100,000 people.

headline.main: Missouri Sen. McCaskill Back to Work After Cancer Treatment

docs.lead_paragraph: Missouri Sen. Claire McCaskill says she's returning to work after breast cancer treatment.

headline.main: Appeals Court Upholds Injunction Against Pot Delivery App
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Upholds Injunction Against Pot Delivery App

docs.snippet: A state appeals court has upheld a judge's decision to block a smartphone app that allowed people in Los Angeles to have medical marijuana delivered to them....
docs.lead_paragraph: A state appeals court has upheld a judge's decision to block a smartphone app that allowed people in Los Angeles to have medical marijuana delivered to them.

headline.main: California Man Sentenced for Lying About Islamic State
headline.print_headline: California Man Sentenced for Lying About Islamic State

docs.snippet: A federal judge Monday sentenced a Syrian-American man living in San Diego to eight years in prison for lying to U.S. officials when questioned about knowing a member of the Islamic State group and for participating in combat against the Syrian re...
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge Monday sentenced a Syrian-American man living in San Diego to eight years in prison for lying to U.S. officials when questioned about knowing a member of the Islamic State group and for participating in combat against the Syrian regime.

headline.main: Oklahoma Man Convicted in Quadruple Murder
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Man Convicted in Quadruple Murder

docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma man has been convicted in the deaths of four women shot in the head after their hands were tied behind their backs.

headline.main: UConn, S Carolina, Notre Dame, Baylor Top NCAA Tourney Field
headline.print_headline: UConn, S Carolina, Notre Dame, Baylor Top NCAA Tourney Field

docs.snippet: Breanna Stewart made it her goal to win four titles in her career at UConn. Now she and her Huskies are six wins away from accomplishing that unprecedented feat....
docs.lead_paragraph: Breanna Stewart made it her goal to win four titles in her career at UConn. Now she and her Huskies are six wins away from accomplishing that unprecedented feat.

headline.main: North Korean Leader Says Will Soon Conduct Nuclear, Missile Tests
headline.print_headline: North Korean Leader Says Will Soon Conduct Nuclear, Missile Tests

docs.snippet: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said his country would soon conduct a nuclear warhead test and a test launch of ballistic missiles capable of carrying nuclear warheads, the North's official KCNA news agency reported on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said his country would soon conduct a nuclear warhead test and a test launch of ballistic missiles capable of carrying nuclear warheads, the North's official KCNA news agency reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: Georgia Governor Calls for Follow-Up Bills to Campus Carry
headline.print_headline: Georgia Governor Calls for Follow-Up Bills to Campus Carry

docs.snippet: Days after Georgia lawmakers approved a bill lifting a weapons ban on the state's public college campuses, Republican Gov. Nathan Deal called Monday for the General Assembly to address opponents' concerns....
docs.lead_paragraph: Days after Georgia lawmakers approved a bill lifting a weapons ban on the state's public college campuses, Republican Gov. Nathan Deal called Monday for the General Assembly to address opponents' concerns.

headline.main: Vatican Prelate Admits Leaks; Says Woman 'Spy' Intimidated Him
headline.print_headline: Vatican Prelate Admits Leaks; Says Woman 'Spy' Intimidated Him

docs.snippet: A Vatican prelate on Monday admitted in court he had leaked confidential documents to the media and said he had been manipulated into it by a woman co-defendant who claimed she was a spy....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Vatican prelate on Monday admitted in court he had leaked confidential documents to the media and said he had been manipulated into it by a woman co-defendant who claimed she was a spy.
